products.title: Daydream Bouquet
products.description: EXCLUSIVE Leave a lasting impression on your Valentine with the ultimate gifting experience. Our luxury trio is presented in an exquisite box with gold ribbon. Just lift the lid off and watch as the sides fall away, revealing each beautiful surprise inside. Features a single preserved S, selected for its size and perfection, a prosecco-scented shimmer candle in gold mercury glass and a 12-piece box of decadent Godiva® chocolate truffles. A truly memorable surprise for someone you love.

products.title: Wonderful Wishes
products.description: Like a warm embrace, our vibrant flower bouquet delivers your sentiments to someone special. A rich gathering of yellow and orange blooms, with pops of bright pink and purple, it's more than a gift…it's a way to express how you feel inside..

products.title: Floral Embrace
products.description: Lovely memories are made with thoughtful gifts for the ones we care about. Our charming lavender flower bouquet is loosely gathered with a medley of lavender & white blooms. Hand-designed inside a clear cylinder vase with cascading greenery all around, it’s a wonderful way to express the sentiments you have inside your heart.

products.title: Two Dozes Assorted
products.description: EXCLUSIVE Just like a daydream. Our delightful lavender bouquet is gathered with accents of pink and lush greenery in our striking fluted violet gathering vase. Designed in vintage pressed glass with ribbed detailing, it captures the rich beauty of the blooms, along with the thoughtfulness of your sentiment.

products.title: Lovely Lavender
products.description: LOCAL ARTISAN EXCLUSIVE Putting a bright start in somebody’s day starts with a beautiful gift. Our delightfully vibrant bouquet is filled with a medley of blooms in cheerful pops of orange, pink and yellow, with plenty of lush greenery mixed in. Designed by the talented Breanna Cartwright from Fresh Ideas Flowers Company in Modesto, California, it’s the perfect pick-me-up surprise, whatever the sentiment.

products.title: Two Dozen Red Roses
products.description: The name says it all: Our fresh fruit garden of juicy pineapple daisies, mouthwatering melon, dipped strawberries and more is gathered into a bright red container, making it the perfect treat for sharing, whatever the reason.

products.title: Fields of Europe
products.description: That feeling of bliss, captured in a bouquet. Inspired by the beauty of the European countryside, our best seller brings together radiant roses and lush lilies in a glass vase wrapped in red ribbon. Whatever your reason for reaching out, it’s a gift that delivers on delight.

products.title: Vibrant Floral Medley
products.description: EXCLUSIVE The key to an unforgettable Valentine’s Day. Red & pink blooms are arranged in our luxurious ruby red vase. Featuring diamond cuts that brilliantly catch the light, it’s a gift that delivers on sparkle and elegance.

products.title: Happy Gerbara Daisies
products.description: Every love story should start with something this sweet. Our romantic creation comes with juicy pineapple letters that spell how you feel, along with a juicy mix of strawberries, melon and more. Share it with someone special and write your own happy ending. Also available with chocolaty dipped & drizzled pineapple letters. Add a balloon to their gift for an uplifting surprise.

products.title: Classic Budding Rose
products.description: EXCLUSIVE Classic romance meets all-out luxury. Our genuine red roses are kissed with a shimmer of gold. Selected for their size and perfection, each one is carefully preserved to maintain its exquisite beauty, then artfully arranged in a heart-shaped container. For a truly magnificent Valentine’s surprise, add our exclusive heart pendant necklace.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Roses
products.description: Every love story should start with something this sweet. Our romantic creation comes with juicy pineapple letters that spell how you feel, along with a juicy mix of strawberries, melon and more. Share it with someone special and write your own happy ending. Also available with chocolaty dipped & drizzled pineapple letters. Add a balloon to their gift for an uplifting surprise.

products.title: Gourmet Drizzled Strawberries
products.description: EXCLUSIVE Our Valentine’s bundle has classic and cute covered! A radiant red rose plant hits the mark inside a decorative heart container. It’s paired with a huggable plush bear and a festive balloon. Add a heart-shaped box of Simply Chocolate® truffles for a sweet, decadent finish.

For a truly magnificent Valentine’s surprise, add our exclusive heart pendant necklace.

products.title: Deliciously Decadent
products.description: Love is something to be treasured. Our striking Valentine’s arrangement captures that sentiment with a unique mix of jewel toned blooms, including purple Veronica, pink lisianthus and red Leucadendron. Gathered by our florists, it’s a gift that delivers on romance.

products.description: Perfectly lovely. Perfectly Valentine’s. Our lily bouquet is gathered with farm-fresh red, pink and white blooms to let someone know they’re in your heart.
